name: Slyme!
description:
This little game about a slime, is the prototype of a bigger project I have in mind. 

*it is my first video game, and I know it has bugs, which I will fix in the future.*

Controls:

(A) Left || (S) Rigth

(SPACE BAR) Jump

Credits:

Music Title: "8Bit Action - Menu Select" - BogartVGM

Background Title: "Caverns 2” - Lornn (Itch.io)

BackGround & Tileset: "Free Swamp 2D Tileset Pixel Art" - Craftpix.net

Background Music: "8 Bit Action - Stage 1" - BogartVGM

Player Sprites: tienlev (Itch.io)

Enemies Sprites: rvros (Itch.io)

Level Design: Tejuelo (Author)
